content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">     <ShortName>Search Site</ShortName>     <Description>Search this site using open search ...</Description>     <Tags></Tags>     <Contact></Contact>              <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" template="http://caspian.iwlearn.org/opensearch_description.xml" rel="self"/>                   <Url type="application/rss+xml" template="http://caspian.iwlearn.org/opensearch_rss.xml?SearchableText={searchTerms}&b_start:int={startIndex?}&b_size:int={count?}" indexOffset="0" rel="results"/>                   <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="http://caspian.iwlearn.org/opensearch_atom.xml?SearchableText={searchTerms}&b_start:int={startIndex?}&b_size:int={count?}" indexOffset="0" rel="results"/>                   <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" template="http://caspian.iwlearn.org/opensearch_suggestions?command={searchTerms}" rel="suggestions"/>                   <Url type="text/html" template="http://caspian.iwlearn.org/search?SearchableText={searchTerms}" indexOffset="0" rel="results"/>          <Query role="example" searchTerms="None"/>     <Image>http://caspian.iwlearn.org/favicon.ico</Image>  </OpenSearchDescription>
